scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin player-guide.html -dist --htmlmin -o dist/player-guide.html && usemin gm-guide.html -dist --htmlmin -o dist/gm-guide.html && usemin items.html -dist --htmlmin -o dist/items.html && usemin rules.html -dist --htmlmin -o dist/rules.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
